title: How to get more than one correspondent to show in cards?
content: I'm using cards view in threaded mode. When collapsed, the card shows only the name or email of the sender of the first message in the conversation. Is there a way of getting a list of all correspondents to show? Or at least, to show the sender of the last message? This is especially relevant in the case of email chains with multiple correspondents. Currently, whomever started the chain will always be the first message and hence the top-most card. When new people respond, it shows the thread as "unread", however, the name of whomever sent the new email remains hidden until I expand the thread. Is there any way to change that behavior?
creator: jdhauck

title: Using Local Folder - sent messages are setted to be saved in Sent Folder, but not
content:
Hi. I use Thunderbird PortableApps, version 141.0, 6 email accounts, all configured to get via POP and send via SMTP.

That was configured each account has his tree folder. when I found the possibility of joining all the accounts in a local folder, I made this change.

After that, despite each account has it's settings to save copy into the Sent folder, all sent messages are listed into the main Received folder.

Strange behaviour. So, I create a filter action to move all emails from "me" to the sent folder.

Is this normal?
